name: One Barbarian Futa Tribe Chapter 1: Violet
name_original: One Barbarian Futa Tribe Chapter 1: Violet
description:
This is a short linear visual novel at around 6000 words. In this visual novel, you will get to make several choices that will slightly change how the story plays out. There is a focus on adult content and themes. This visual novel is designed to be the first chapter in a larger series.

In this visual novel, you play as Ezra. Due to recent expansions, you’ve been forced from your safe logistics job to the Scouts. You now find yourself out in the wilderness trying to track down the bandits who attacked a caravan. As luck would have it, you don’t find any bandits. Unfortunately, a tribe of rather hung futa barbarians finds you in the process.
